pullrequest.title: Fix race conditions in Master::ProcessMessage and Publisher::OnPublishComplete

content.raw:
I just did some testing against the 9.9.0 debs with your script, and I've seen a few backtraces at the following places in `Publisher::OnPublishComplete`:

* [Publisher.cc:243](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/gazebo9_9.9.0/gazebo/transport/Publisher.cc#lines-243)
* [Publisher.cc:252](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/gazebo9_9.9.0/gazebo/transport/Publisher.cc#lines-252)

With this branch, I only tend to see backtraces in [~Publisher](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/87af797edfef683ee2e5b20e267e446fb3b514ea/gazebo/transport/Publisher.cc#lines-55), with the following console message:

~~~
gzserver: /usr/include/boost/thread/pthread/mutex.hpp:111: boost::mutex::~mutex(): Assertion `!res' failed.
~~~

I'm about to start testing with your branch.
content.html:
I just did some testing against the 9.9.0 debs with your script, and I've seen a few backtraces at the following places in Publisher::OnPublishComplete:

  • Publisher.cc:243
  • Publisher.cc:252

With this branch, I only tend to see backtraces in ~Publisher, with the following console message:

gzserver: /usr/include/boost/thread/pthread/mutex.hpp:111: boost::mutex::~mutex(): Assertion `!res' failed.

I'm about to start testing with your branch.
